ch0300_00_jujube/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
How good of you to finally show up.
ch0300_00_jujube/0101_0701_02_10:
Come now—move along! You’ll be working hard
for me today, so prepare yourself!
ch0300_00_jujube/7101_0701_01_10:
Good grief... Look at you. Your strength leaves
much to be desired.
ch0300_00_jujube/7101_0701_02_10:
I know someone with the means and mettle to fix
that. Shall I arrange an introduction?
ch0300_00_jujube/7101_0701_03_10:
He is a tough old man with a head as smooth as
a cue ball.
ch0300_00_jujube/7101_0701_04_10:
Ohoho... Or might you prefer to meet a beautiful,
black-haired young woman instead?
ch0300_00_jujube/7102_0701_01_10:
Tch! This is bad. The world’s coming apart.
My energy must be close to gone, too.
ch0300_00_jujube/7102_0701_02_10:
...Look, wearing makeup for too long is bad for
my skin—understand what I’m trying to say?
ch0300_00_jujube/7103_0701_01_10:
I am the queen of the Land of Enchantment, and
I require MASSIVE amounts of power to maintain
control of the magical world...
ch0300_00_jujube/7103_0701_02_10:
I source this power from humans by siphoning their
life energy and making it my own.
ch0300_00_jujube/7103_0701_03_10:
Ohohoho... That’s why this island is so perfect—it’s
positively full of energetic little brats!
ch0300_00_jujube/7104_0701_01_10:
If I set up doors connecting this island to the
magical world, people who possess strong energy
are sure to come stumbling into my realm...
ch0300_00_jujube/7104_0701_02_10:
All those who enter will become weak and
powerless—no matter who they are! Such is
the nature of the magical world!
ch0300_00_jujube/7104_0701_03_10:
And they’ll be too drained to even THINK of
escaping!
ch0300_00_jujube/7104_0701_04_10: Ahahaha! Is it not a PERFECT plan?!
ch0300_00_jujube/7105_0701_02_10: I’m absorbing your life-force as we speak!
ch0300_00_jujube/7105_0701_03_10:
Ahahaha! I’m rid of my wrinkles and the bags
under my eyes! I feel absolutely splendid!
ch0300_00_jujube/1701_0701_01_10: Here, this is for you. Take it with gratitude!
ch0300_00_jujube/1701_0702_01_10: Th-there’s no deep meaning to it...OK?
ch0300_00_jujube/2501_0701_01_10:
You’re...peculiar. I’m actually enjoying your
company.
ch0300_00_jujube/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve decided not to absorb your life energy—
I’ll make you my servant instead!
ch0300_00_jujube/2501_0702_01_10:
What’s the matter? Why are you hovering about
like you’re waiting to serve me?
ch0300_00_jujube/2501_0702_02_10:
What?! I-I was in character when we spoke
before—don’t take what I said so seriously!
ch0300_00_jujube/2501_0702_03_10:
Although...I wasn’t in character when I said I
enjoy your company...
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0701_01_10:
I am Bellelba, the queen of the Land of
Enchantment—not some young woman named
Sabrina with psychic powers.
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0701_02_10:
Oh, but I did hear that her life energy became
more potent after she began acting.
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0701_03_10:
She’s happy to have found a career path as
an actress...or so I’m told.
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0702_01_10: Why don’t you try acting with Sabrina?
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s fun pretending to be someone different...
or so I hear.
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0702_03_10: Hehe, I can see it now...
ch0300_00_jujube/2511_0702_04_10:
a future where you and Sabrina are both on
screen together!
ch0300_00_jujube/3001_0701_01_10:
Ahhh, I’m so sleepy. It seems that I don’t have
enough energy...
ch0300_00_jujube/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten lunch? I’ll need you fully fortified
with nutrients—for my sake.
ch0300_00_jujube/3005_0701_01_10:
Well? Are you ready to give up and return to the
magic cage?
